readable.title: 3211289105_e0360a9c7f
readable.content: A bride getting ready with her bridesmaids wearing red . Bride wearing her wedding dress receives help by her bridesmaids wearing red dresses . Family preparing for the wedding . The woman getting married has a beautiful gown on while her bride 's maids are wearing red dresses . Three bridesmaids in red and an older woman in beige are adjusting the bride 's white dress .
